name: Apartment C3-1003
address: C3 - 1003, Ecopark, Hanoi, Vietnam, Son Tay, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Kim Quan, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi and a terrace. The unit is 9 km from Hanoi. Free private parking is available on site.

The kitchen comes with an oven and there is a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. Other facilities at Apartment C3-1003 include a fitness centre and year-round outdoor pool.

Bike hire is available at the property and the area is popular for golfing and cycling. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 30 km from the property.
